creator: Towo Labs
descriptionHtml:
Bifrost Wallet is the first mobile crypto wallet and dapp browser ready for Songbird and Flare. Supported crypto assets include top assets like ETH, XRP and SGB.

YOUR KEYS, YOUR CRYPTO
Bifrost Wallet makes it easy to securely hold, send and receive coins, tokens and NFTs. Your private keys are stored on your device only. Backup and restore your wallet using a standard 12 or 24-word recovery phrase, compatible with other wallets like MetaMask, Trust Wallet and Ledger.

RECLAIM YOUR PRIVACY
Bifrost Wallet is developed in accordance with the principles of privacy by design and data minimization. We are always thinking about your privacy when designing our software and services. In addition, we have a zero tolerance policy against ads and trackers.

DAPP BROWSER
You can use Bifrost Wallet to browse and interact with decentralized applications (Dapps) like Uniswap, Compound and Aave, while keeping your private keys secure and confidential. Bifrost Wallet provides a comprehensive overview of transaction details, avoiding blind signing common in other wallets.

SONGBIRD AND FLARE
Bifrost Wallet is ready for the new era of decentralized finance being built on Songbird and Flare, including Flare Time Series Oracle (FTSO), Spark delegation, F-assets and decentralized applications from Flare Finance, Aurei and Probity Finance.

SECURITY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY
We take security very seriously and our developers have experience from contributing to other wallets in the ecosystem. We continuously test, review and audit our code base. Bifrost Wallet has also been independently audited by the well-respected German security firm Cure53, with no vulnerabilities found.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have any questions or need support, you can always visit our help center at https://support.bifrostwallet.com or contact us at support@bifrostwallet.com.
descriptionShort: Crypto wallet for decentralized finance on Ethereum, Songbird, Flare and beyond.

- Wrapping, unwrapping and delegating Songbird
- App protection with PIN or biometrics
- In-app browser for decentralized apps
- Secure recovery phrase generation and import (BIP39/BIP44)

title: Bifrost Wallet

creator: Towo Labs AB
descriptionHtml:
Bifrost Wallet is the first mobile crypto wallet and dapp browser ready for Songbird and Flare. Supported crypto assets include top assets like ETH, XRP and SGB.

YOUR KEYS, YOUR CRYPTO
Bifrost Wallet makes it easy to securely hold, send and receive coins, tokens and NFTs. Your private keys are stored on your device only. Backup and restore your wallet using a standard 12 or 24-word recovery phrase, compatible with other wallets like MetaMask, Trust Wallet and Ledger.

RECLAIM YOUR PRIVACY
Bifrost Wallet is developed in accordance with the principles of privacy by design and data minimization. We are always thinking about your privacy when designing our software and services. In addition, we have a zero tolerance policy against ads and trackers.

DAPP BROWSER
You can use Bifrost Wallet to browse and interact with decentralized applications (Dapps) like Uniswap, Compound and Aave, while keeping your private keys secure and confidential. Bifrost Wallet provides a comprehensive overview of transaction details, avoiding blind signing common in other wallets.

SONGBIRD AND FLARE
Bifrost Wallet is ready for the new era of decentralized finance being built on Songbird and Flare, including Flare Time Series Oracle (FTSO), Spark delegation, F-assets and decentralized applications from Flare Finance, Aurei and Probity Finance.

SECURITY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY
We take security very seriously and our developers have experience from contributing to other wallets in the ecosystem. We continuously test, review and audit our code base. Bifrost Wallet has also been independently audited by the well-respected German security firm Cure53, with no vulnerabilities found.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have any questions or need support, you can always visit our help center at https://support.bifrostwallet.com or contact us at support@bifrostwallet.com.

You can use Bifrost Wallet to browse and interact with decentralized applications (Dapps) like Uniswap, Compound and Aave, while keeping your private keys secure and confidential. Bifrost Wallet provides a comprehensive overview of transaction details, avoiding blind signing common in other wallets.

SONGBIRD AND FLARE
Bifrost Wallet is ready for the new era of decentralized finance being built on Songbird and Flare, including Flare Time Series Oracle (FTSO), Spark delegation, F-assets and decentralized applications from Flare Finance, Aurei and Probity Finance.

SECURITY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY
We take security very seriously and our developers have experience from contributing to other wallets in the ecosystem. We continuously test, review and audit our code base. Bifrost Wallet has also been independently audited by the well-respected German security firm Cure53, with no vulnerabilities found.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have any questions or need support, you can always visit our help center at https://support.bifrostwallet.com or contact us at support@bifrostwallet.com.

title:
Bifrost Wallet
0.6.19

creator: Towo Labs
descriptionHtml:
Bifrost Wallet is the preferred crypto wallet and dapp browser for Flare and Songbird. Supported crypto assets include top assets like Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Base, Polygon, Optimism and others.

YOUR KEYS, YOUR CRYPTO
Bifrost Wallet makes it easy to securely hold, send and receive coins, tokens and NFTs. Your private keys are stored on your device only. Backup and restore your wallet using a standard 12 or 24-word recovery phrase, compatible with other popular crypto wallets.

RECLAIM YOUR PRIVACY
Bifrost Wallet is developed in accordance with the principles of privacy by design and data minimization. We are always thinking about your privacy when designing our software and services. In addition, we have a zero tolerance policy against ads and trackers.

DAPP BROWSER
You can use Bifrost Wallet to browse and interact with decentralized applications (Dapps) like Uniswap, Compound and Aave, while keeping your private keys secure and confidential. Bifrost Wallet provides a comprehensive overview of transaction details, avoiding blind signing common in other wallets.

FLARE and SONGBIRD
Bifrost Wallet is ready for the new era of decentralized finance being built on Flare and Songbird, including Wrapped Flare (WFLR) delegation, FlareDrops reward claiming, FAssets and decentralized applications such as Stargate, Kinetic, Enosys, Sceptre and SparkDEX.

WALLETCONNECT PIONEERS
The Bifrost Wallet team has contributed to WalletConnect specifications for Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin and XRP Ledger. Enabling new applications and cross-chain use-cases. You can connect Bifrost Wallet to novel Bitcoin dapps like the FAssets Dashboard and XRP Ledger dapps like XPMarket.

SECURITY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY
We take security very seriously and our developers have experience from contributing to other wallets in the ecosystem. We continuously test, review and audit our code base. Bifrost Wallet has also been independently audited by the well-respected security firms Cure53 and FYEO.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have any questions or need support, you can always visit our help center at https://support.bifrostwallet.com or contact us at support@bifrostwallet.com.

title:
Bifrost Wallet
0.6.31

creator: Towo Labs
descriptionHtml:
Bifrost Wallet is the preferred crypto wallet and dapp browser for Flare and Songbird. Supported crypto assets include top assets like Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Base, Polygon, Optimism and others.

YOUR KEYS, YOUR CRYPTO
Bifrost Wallet makes it easy to securely hold, send and receive coins, tokens and NFTs. Your private keys are stored on your device only. Backup and restore your wallet using a standard 12 or 24-word recovery phrase, compatible with other popular crypto wallets.

RECLAIM YOUR PRIVACY
Bifrost Wallet is developed in accordance with the principles of privacy by design and data minimization. We are always thinking about your privacy when designing our software and services. In addition, we have a zero tolerance policy against ads and trackers.

DAPP BROWSER
You can use Bifrost Wallet to browse and interact with decentralized applications (Dapps) like Uniswap, Compound and Aave, while keeping your private keys secure and confidential. Bifrost Wallet provides a comprehensive overview of transaction details, avoiding blind signing common in other wallets.

FLARE and SONGBIRD
Bifrost Wallet is ready for the new era of decentralized finance being built on Flare and Songbird, including Wrapped Flare (WFLR) delegation, FlareDrops reward claiming, FAssets and decentralized applications such as Stargate, Kinetic, Enosys, Sceptre and SparkDEX.

WALLETCONNECT PIONEERS
The Bifrost Wallet team has contributed to WalletConnect specifications for Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin and XRP Ledger. Enabling new applications and cross-chain use-cases. You can connect Bifrost Wallet to novel Bitcoin dapps like the FAssets Dashboard and XRP Ledger dapps like XPMarket.

SECURITY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY
We take security very seriously and our developers have experience from contributing to other wallets in the ecosystem. We continuously test, review and audit our code base. Bifrost Wallet has also been independently audited by the well-respected security firms Cure53 and FYEO.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have any questions or need support, you can always visit our help center at https://support.bifrostwallet.com or contact us at support@bifrostwallet.com.
